ENGLISH: This NewGRF add the vehicles of MTR to China Set.
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: 为中国包追加了港铁的载具
TRADITIONAL CHINESE: 為中國包增加了港鐵的載具。{}繁體中文缺少本地化人員，如有意向請加入我們discord群組https://discord.com/invte/hmWauemwse

ENGLISH: This NewGRF is in Early Access.Update in the future may broke the compatable.
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: 仍在测试当中，可能存在不稳定情况。后续更新可能会破坏兼容

ENGLISH: Adjust vehicle loading speed. Default is 100%.
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: 调整车辆装载速度。默认为100%。

ENGLISH: Adjust vehicle purchase costs. Default is 25%.
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: 调整车辆购买费用。默认为25%。

ENGLISH: Adjust vehicle running costs. Default is 25%.
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: 调整车辆运营费用。默认为25%。

ENGLISH: Adjust cargo age period of coaches and wagons. "Long" is "Standard" doubled, while "Very Long" is "Long" doubled. Even in "Standard" mode, cargo age period varies.
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: 调整车厢的货物贬值周期。“较长”为“标准”的两倍，“很长”是“较长”的两倍。即使在“标准”设置下，货物贬值周期也随车厢种类而变化。

ENGLISH: Capacity of Nomal Class(include 2nd-Class, 3rd-Class) Coaches of trains and Buses.
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: 决定普通车厢(包括二等车，三等车)的载客量倍数

ENGLISH: This GRF needs dynamic_engines to be turned on. Open console, and type "setting dynamic_engines 1".
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: 请切换至控制台模式, 键入 "setting dynamic_engines 1", 否则您无法游玩中国包.

ENGLISH: This is a debug string, you shouldn't see it. But it happened, why?
- Max Speed 350 km/h, Running Costs Increase
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: - 最高速度 350 km/h，运营费用增加

ENGLISH: Refittable to Max Speed 350 km/h (Increasing running costs)
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: 可改装为最高速度 350 km/h，运营费用增加
- 根据建造年份选择设计
{BLACK}货物贬值周期因子：{YELLOW}185{BLACK}，装载活禽/畜{BLUE}560

ENGLISH: {BLACK}Cafe Effect:  {GOLD}Attaching Restaurant Car Halves Running Costs of Non-Commuter Passenger Cars except Restaurant Cars, and Increases Cargo Age Period by 1/4
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: {BLACK}餐车的作用：{GOLD}加挂餐车使除餐车外的所有非通勤客车运行费用减半，货物贬值周期增加1/4

ENGLISH: {BLACK}Air Conditioner Effect:  {GOLD}Attaching Air Conditioner Generator Car Increases Cargo Age Period of Most Passenger Cars Hauled by Locomotives without Electricity Supply
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: {BLACK}空调发电车的作用：{GOLD}加挂空调发电车可增加大部分非机供机车牵引客车的货物贬值周期
{BLACK}空调：{GOLD}需要带供电的机车供电

ENGLISH: {BLACK}With Air Conditioner Compartment {RED}ONLY USED BY ITSELF
SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: {BLACK}自带空调发电机{RED}但仅用于本车厢

SIMPLIFIED CHINESE: {BLACK}配属于以下动车：{LTBLUE}九广铁路英段/东铁线{BLACK}所有动车，{DKGREEN}CAF-Train(机场快线型){BLACK}，{RED}港铁{ORANGE}“动感号”{BLACK}高速动车组
